anar

Class ParamDynamicMinMax

java.lang.Object
  anar.Parametric
      anar.Param
          anar.ParamDynamicMinMax

public class ParamDynamicMinMax
extends Param

Param with dynamic (Param itself) for min and max. In this case, maximum values could be changed. TODO do not seem to work. merge with constructors in Param
